name: Daily Net Report
query:
SELECT
    pe.branch AS "Branch",

    SUM(
        CASE 
            WHEN pe.payment_type = 'Receive' THEN pe.paid_amount 
            ELSE 0 
        END
    ) AS "Total Sales",

    SUM(
        CASE 
            WHEN pe.payment_type = 'Pay' THEN pe.paid_amount 
            ELSE 0 
        END
    ) AS "Total Purchases",

    -- ✅ الصافي للفرع في الفترة
    SUM(
        CASE 
            WHEN pe.payment_type = 'Receive' THEN pe.paid_amount 
            ELSE 0 
        END
    )
    -
    SUM(
        CASE 
            WHEN pe.payment_type = 'Pay' THEN pe.paid_amount 
            ELSE 0 
        END
    ) AS "Net Amount"

FROM `tabPayment Entry` pe

WHERE
    pe.docstatus = 1
    AND pe.posting_date >= %(from_date)s
    AND pe.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
    -- فلتر الفرع (اختياري)
    AND (
        OR pe.branch = %(branch)s
        OR %(branch)s = NULL
    )

GROUP BY
    pe.branch

ORDER BY
    pe.branch;
